Intercepted funds are locked with RSA, but the modulus was carelessly chosen as a product of two Blum primes. The ciphertext is: 1443654391514147365577779419971761481437087809576377836155946432491945435726601637896391597930582437439763334067944097812562109610654256225524206992293272

The flag format is flag{...}
n=5405524032494390682398252421661998953569499987415168262587276361127228645352628593997848133867509095515563607050935589701565463229191139796242938892968981, e=2039599323049281298498267588122232463227011787840295911888667222445603234596967114584030197357162611629587362198453159877221342227324626591702954023563009
The lower 104 bits of p are: 2136177453505233308053240930574797207


---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{l5eat98u}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 1443654391514147365577779419971761481437087809576377836155946432491945435726601637896391597930582437439763334067944097812562109610654256225524206992293272
vulnerability: blum integers
hint: Blum integers are products of primes congruent to 3 modulo 4. These integers have unique properties in cryptography.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=5405524032494390682398252421661998953569499987415168262587276361127228645352628593997848133867509095515563607050935589701565463229191139796242938892968981, e=2039599323049281298498267588122232463227011787840295911888667222445603234596967114584030197357162611629587362198453159877221342227324626591702954023563009
The lower 104 bits of p are: 2136177453505233308053240930574797207

extra_info: p=75499781647795816365131870296703789908779398402659084912398543497903258470807, q=71596551864361618724372371517170453449861421752720419721217662725033342156083, Ï†(n)=5405524032494390682398252421661998953569499987415168262587276361127228645352481497664335976432419591273749732807576948881410083724557523590020002292342092
